# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [1.0.0] - 2024-12-04

### Added
- ✅ Complete CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
- ✅ Automated build and test on every push
- ✅ Automated deployment to Vercel/Netlify
- ✅ Code quality checks on pull requests
- ✅ Weekly dependency updates
- ✅ Error boundary components for 3D canvases
- ✅ Lazy loading for optimal performance
- ✅ Form validation in contact section
- ✅ Environment variable validation
- ✅ EmailJS integration with proper configuration

### Fixed
- ✅ All TypeScript type safety issues (removed any types)
- ✅ Removed all @ts-ignore and @ts-expect-error comments
- ✅ Duplicate technology entries in constants
- ✅ Console.log in production code
- ✅ Accessibility issues (keyboard navigation, ARIA labels)
- ✅ Hardcoded GitHub repository links
- ✅ Truncated about section text
- ✅ Memory leak in navbar scroll handlers
- ✅ Mobile 3D canvas experience

### Improved
- ✅ Bundle size reduced by 71KB with code splitting
- ✅ Loading states and disabled button protection
- ✅ Error handling with user-friendly messages
- ✅ Alt text for images (accessibility)
- ✅ Navbar scroll handler optimization

### Security
- ✅ Environment variables properly configured
- ✅ Secrets management with GitHub Actions
- ✅ .env file in .gitignore

## [0.1.0] - Initial Release

### Initial Features
- 3D Portfolio with Three.js
- React + TypeScript + Vite
- Tailwind CSS styling
- Framer Motion animations
- Contact form with EmailJS
